ComicInfo.Title: Part 3 of 4
ComicInfo.Series: Star Wars: Infinities - A New Hope
ComicInfo.Summary: In an altered Star Wars timeline, the Death Star is never destroyed and the Rebellion is seemingly crushed. The Empire's strong presence throughout the galaxy leads to the formation of a new Senate, filled with Imperial puppets. Han Solo and Chewbacca watch in amazement as the newest Senator from the planet Coruscant, the Imperial throneworld, is announced - Leia Organa! Hope springs on Dagobah, as Luke Skywalker nears the completion of his training with Jedi Master Yoda. But can any amount of training prepare him for the combined dark forces of the Emperor, Darth Vader, and Leia, Vader's new apprentice?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-31 21:34:15. [CVDB166303] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 21:35:57. [Issue ID 291711]
ComicInfo.Characters: Emperor Palpatine [Darth Sidious],Luke Skywalker,Chewbacca,Han Solo,Darth Vader [Anakin Skywalker],Yoda,Princess Leia Organa,Obi-Wan Kenobi (ghost),R2-D2
